entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 9:53 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:53 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
